It allows developers to quickly and easily create responsive and mobile-friendly websites. In Bootstrap 5.3, the text and font utilities have been enhanced to provide more flexibility and control over typography. ### Objective and Scope The objective of this documentation is to provide a comprehensive guide on how to use the text and font utilities in Bootstrap 5.3. It covers the various classes and options available to style text and fonts in your web pages. ### Requirements and Pre-requisites To follow along with this documentation, you will need the following: - Basic knowledge of HTML and CSS - Bootstrap 5.3 installed in your project ### Step-by-Step Instructions 1. Overusing them can make your code harder to maintain. - Keep your code organized by grouping related utility classes together. - Test your web pages on different devices and screen sizes to ensure the text and fonts are displayed correctly. ### Summary and Conclusion In this documentation, we explored the text and font utilities in Bootstrap 5.3. We learned how to use utility classes to style text and fonts in our web pages.
